document_data.name: Welcar
document_data.mainbody: '''Welcar''' was a member of the [[Citadel of Assassins]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Welcar was a member of the Citadel's bandit army in the late 1450s DR following the [[Vaasan War]]. He was first in line to replace [[Felix]] as the leader of both the [[Bloody Swords]] infantry unit and the [[Fleet Brigade]].
